fields.name: isThorns
javadoc: Whether this EntityDamageSource is from an entity wearing Thorns-enchanted armor.

methods.name: getEntity
javadoc: Retrieves the true causer of the damage, e.g. the player who fired an arrow, the shulker who fired the bullet, etc.

methods.name: getLocalizedDeathMessage
javadoc: Gets the death message that is displayed when the player dies

methods.name: getSourcePosition
javadoc: Gets the location from which the damage originates.

methods.name: scalesWithDifficulty
javadoc: Return whether this damage source will have its damage amount scaled based on the current difficulty.

methods.name: setThorns
javadoc: Sets this EntityDamageSource as originating from Thorns armor
